pros: Provides party with Knockback Resistance buff
Has an iFrame Freezing Breath
Has a bind Freezing Breath
cons: Teleport Mastery will trigger Damage Reflect
Need to remember to toggle Magic Guard

linkSkill.desc: When attacking, your attacks have a chance to debuff against the enemy with the highest Max HP
details: [Debuff]: Increases %Damage and %Ignore DEF against this enemy (stacking up to 3 times)
Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Magician to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the quest 'Victoria Island or Bust' and choose the 'Magician, intelligent and magical' option

Once you reach Lv. 30 as a Magician, talk to Grendel the Really Old to accept a quest called 'Path of Ice and Lightning'. Completing the quest will make you a Wizard (Ice, Lightning) and you will be on the path to an Arch Mage (Ice, Lightning). Wizard (Ice, Lightning) is the 2nd job of Arch Mage (Ice, Lightning)

build: -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Chain Lightning - Reinforce, Spread and Extra Strike
  • Frozen Orb - Reinforce and Critical Chance
    • If you already have 100% Crit Chance get Teleport Mastery - Range instead

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to splashos49 for their help in making this overview!

extraContent.title: Freezing Crush
extraContent.content:
In 2nd Job, you gain a passive Freezing Crush which causes your Ice-attributed attacks to apply a stacking debuff that increases the %Crit Damage and %Damage of your Lighting-attribute attacks. Lightning-attribute attacks will consume a stack of the debuff. Additionally, in 3rd Job, you unlock a passive called Shatter that grants a chance for you attacks to gain increased %Ignore DEF per Freezing Crush stack

Below is a list of your Ice-attribute skills:

  • Cold Beam (2nd Job)
  • Chilling Step (2nd Job)
  • Ice Strike (3rd Job)
  • Glacial Chain (3rd Job)
  • Blizzard (4th Job)
  • Frozen Orb (4th Job)
  • Elquines (4th Job)
  • Ice Age (5th Job)
  • Spirit of Snow (5th Job)

Below is a list of your Lightning-attribute skills:

  • Thunder Bolt (2nd Job)
  • Thunderstorm (3rd Job)
  • Chain Lightning (4th Job)
  • Bolt Barrage (5th Job)
  • Jupiter Thunder (5th Job)

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Energy Bolt
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Damage: 309%, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Casts an explosive orb forward

primary.name: Magic Guard
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 13, Damage Displaced: 85% of your MP, Duration: While the skill is activated
primary.desc: When toggled, a portion of your damage taken will be redirected towards your MP

primary.name: Teleport
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Teleport to the left and right with 170, and up and down with 275
primary.desc: Teleports you in the direction you are moving in with your Arrow Keys
details: Can be used in the air and on ladders

primary.name: Magic Armor
primary.shortDesc: Defense: +100

primary.name: MP Boost
primary.shortDesc: Max MP: +20%, Attack Speed: +1, MP increases by 120 per level\nCritical Rate: +5% when equipped with a Wand

primary.name: Cold Beam
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 27, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 199%, Number of Attacks: 3, Freeze Duration: 8
primary.desc: Ice shards that strike down on enemies in front of you
details: Enemies that are hit will freeze and be slowed down

primary.name: Freezing Crush
primary.shortDesc: Grants Critical Damage: +2% per stack when attacking a Frozen enemy. Lightning-based skills consume ice stacks, granting Damage: +9% per stack.
primary.desc: Attacking enemies with Ice-Attribute attacks will provide a stacking debuff
details: [Debuff]: For each stack, increases %Crit Damage when attacking Frozen enemies and %Damage of Lightning-Attribute attacks

primary.name: Thunder Bolt
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 210%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Lightning bolts strike down on nearby enemies

primary.name: Chilling Step
primary.shortDesc: Upon using the Teleport skill, freezes the ground at 60% chance, dealing 2% to enemies on the frozen ground with freeze stacks. Last 6 sec
primary.desc: When toggled, using will have a chance to freeze the ground slowing enemies and applying stacks of

primary.name: Meditation
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Party Member Magic ATT: +30, Duration: 240 sec

primary.name: Magic Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Weapon's Attack Speed increased for 240 sec
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Spell Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: 50%, Magic ATT: +10

primary.name: High Wisdom
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase INT by 40

primary.name: MP Eater
primary.shortDesc: MP Absorb Chance: 20%, Amount Absorbed: 10% of the enemy's Max HP
primary.desc: Your attacks have a chance to steal a portion of the enemy's %Max HP
details: Does not apply to bosses

primary.name: Ice Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 90, Damage: 335% Number of Attacks: 4, Max Monsters Hit: 8, Freeze Duration: 8 sec
primary.desc: Icicles drop down around you that damage and freeze enemies

primary.name: Glacier Chain
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 65, Damage: 383% Number of Attacks: 3, Max Monsters Hit: 12, Freeze Duration: 8 sec
primary.desc: Pulls in enemies while damaging and freezing them

primary.name: Thunderstorm
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Duration: 90 sec, Damage: 310%, each one fewer enemy increases Damage by 30%. Up to 430% damage on a single target.\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Summons a thunderstorm that strikes nearby enemies and follows you around
details: Deals increased %Damage the fewer enemies there are
Does not consume freezing stacks

primary.name: Elemental Adaptation (Ice, Lightning)
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 190, upon defending critical Abnormal Status attack, for 30 sec, activates a barrier that blocks all Abnormal Status effects and apply 240 sec Cooldown.\n[Passive Effect: Increases All Elemental Resistances and Abnormal Status Resistance by 20%]
primary.desc: Creates a barrier that blocks one Abnormal Status effect
details: Once an Abnormal Status is blocked a (582 - 240 secs depending on Skill Level) cooldown will be applied
[Passive]: Permanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance

primary.name: Elemental Decrease
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Elemental Attribute Resistance: -10%, Duration: 240 sec\n[Passive: Final damage: +50%]

primary.name: Teleport Mastery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 340%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Stun Chance: 80%, Stun Duration: 4 sec, Teleport Distance: +20
primary.desc: When toggled, using will damage nearby enemies
details: Has a chance to stun enemies
Permanently increases the teleport distance

primary.name: Arcane Overdrive
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +30%, Critical Damage: +13%

primary.name: Storm Magic
primary.shortDesc: Deals 20% extra final damage against enemies with the following effects: Damage Over Time, Freeze, Stun, Darkness, or Paralysis

primary.name: Element Amplifcation
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: +50%, Damage: +50%

primary.name: Shatter
primary.shortDesc: Attack frozen enemies with a 20% chance to ignore 5% DEF for each stack

primary.name: Chain Lightning
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 44, Damage: 185%, Number of Attacks: 10, Max Monsters Hit: 6, Stun Chance: 90%, Stun Duration: 4 sec, Additional Critical Rate: 25%
primary.desc: Casts a lightning that bounces to nearby enemies
details: Attack has increased %Crit Rate and a chance to stun enemies

primary.name: Freezing Breath
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 22, makes you invincible. Stun up to 8 enemies and inflicts 450% damage 4 times for 13 sec. Reduces enemy Magic DEF by -30% and Weapon DEF by -15%.
Stun Duration: +100% depending on damage inflicted with Freezing Breath.
Only inflicts damage to stunned enemies.
This effect lasts as long as the key is held, up to 13 sec. Cooldown: 180 sec
primary.desc: Binds enemies hit by the breath while also reducing their %DEF
details: You are invincible while casting but you cannot move

primary.name: Blizzard
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 301%, Number of Attacks: 12, Cooldown: 45 sec\nPass Effect [Final Attack] While on cooldown, your attack skills have a 60% chance to strike a single enemy with a Blizzard, dealing 220% damage.
primary.desc: Creates a shower of icicles that rain down from the sky
details: [Final Attack]: While Blizzard is on cooldown, there is a chance your attacks cause for an icicle to strike a single enemy

primary.name: Frozen Orb
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, create a Frozen Orb that deals 220% damage with ice shards to up to 8 enemies, Cooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Casts a frozen orb that travels in a straight line and slows down when it touches an enemy
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Infinity
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 80, Increases final damage of Magic ATT by 70%.
Periodically recovers base HP and MP by 10% and increases final damage of Magic ATT by 3%.
Final Damage increased by Infinity is additive.
Knockback Resistance: +70%, Duration: 40 sec, Cooldown: 3 min
primary.desc: When active, your skills do not consume mana and you gain increased %Knockback Resistance and %Final Damage
details: Additionally while active, continuously increases %Final Damage and periodically restores %Max HP/MP
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Elquines
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 120, Summon Elquines Duration: 260 sec, Damage: 127%, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Number of Attacks: 3.\n[Passive Effect: Permanently increases Mastery by 70%]
primary.desc: Summons an ice golem that attacks nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect
[Passive]: Increases %Weapon Mastery

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Buff Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increased Magic ATT: +30, Buff Duration: +50%

primary.name: Arcane Aim
primary.shortDesc: Ignores 20% of enemy DEF. Aside from minions' attacks, damage will increase by 8% for 5 sec at a 80% chance when the attack hits. Accumulates up to 5 times.
primary.desc: Damaging an enemy has a chance to grant a stacking %Damage buff (up to 5 times)
details: Summon attacks cannot trigger this effect
Additionally increases %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Frost Clutch
primary.shortDesc: Grants Critical Damage: +3% per stack when attacking a Frozen enemy. Lightning-based skills consume ice stacks, granting Damage +12% per stack.
details: Increases %Crit Damage and %Damage provided per stack

hyperActive.name: Absolute Zero Aura
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60 per second. Grants Knockback Resistance for you and nearby party members: +20%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +20, Elemental Resistance: +20%\nDamage Taken: -20%\nFreezes up to 15 enemies periodically.
details: Has no cooldown

hyperActive.name: Lightning Orb
hyperActive.shortDesc: Key-down skill. MP Cost per atttack: 30, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 150%, Number of Attacks: 15. Can hold the key down for up to 3.6 sec. Max finishing attack based on key-down duration: 780%. Number of Attacks: 15.\nCooldown: 60 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Creates a large zone that continously damages enemies within it
details: At the end of the skill, deal a final attack with damage that scales based on the key-down duration
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Explorer class in the party

fifthMain.name: Ice Age
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 10, Damage: 1000%. Freezes enemies in range.\nArea stays icy for 15 sec, periodically inflicting 250% damage 3 time(s). Damage and freezing effects stack on enemies in range.\nCooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a massive icy explosion that covers the map in ice
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect
The lingering ice field while periodically damaging and inflicting stacks of

fifthMain.name: Bolt Barrage
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, conjures 8 lightning bolts that attack up to 12 enemies, dealing 1600% damage 12 times.
The lightning moves forward as it strikes, but will continue to strike the same place if its path is blocked.
Final Damage of lightning bolt decreases by 20% every time the enemy is attacked repeatedly.
Cooldown: 40 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a wall of lightning that pulses forward
details: Strikes the same location if the path is blocked
If an enemy is hit by the attack multiple times, the %Final Damage is reduced
Unaffected by Damage Reflect
[Tip]: Can be used while casting to increase burst potential

fifthMain.name: Spirit of Snow
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, stacks Freeze, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 9, Damage: 800%, Attack Duration: 30 sec\nDeals 1700% damage when attacking 1 enemy and stacks Freeze 3 time(s)\nCooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a spirit of snow to attack nearby enemies and applies stacks of
details: Deals increased damage and applies 3 stacks when attacking a single enemy
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Jupiter Thunder
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Enemy touched by orb is stunned 8 times with 600% damage at fixed intervals. Max Number of Shocks: 30, reduces Freeze stacks for every 5 stuns.
Shocked enemies receive 12% increased Final Damage from lightning attribute attacks except Jupiter Thunder.
Electric current flows around shocked enemy, attacking 2 enemies 4 times with 400% damage periodically.
Cooldown: 120 sec, cooldown reduced by 3.4 sec for every number of shocks that didn't activate.
fifthMain.desc: Fires a lightning orb that expands when it collides with a target and continuously damages nearby enemies
details: The orb will continue to travel again if the current target is defeated
The orb has a fixed number of shocks it can deal before it disappears
Reduces stacks each time an enemy is shocked 5 times by the orb
Enemies hit by the attack receive increased %Final Damage from Lightning-attribute attacks except Jupiter Thunder
Unaffected by Damage Reflect
Cooldown is reduced based on how many shocks remain

meta: Arch Mage (Ice, Lightning) is an INT mage class part of the Explorers class group. I/L Mages utilize both ice and lightning magic for their attacks. Their ice attacks freeze enemies which provide bonus damage to their lightning attacks
